pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate the effects of transrectal compression of the prostate for intra-operative prostatic swelling and intraprostatic point shift during high-intensity focused ultrasound treatment of localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Utility of a 3-dimensional transrectal ultrasound-guided prostate biopsy system for prostate cancer detection
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19334790/
